Articles.Content: Ok I'm a noob and I'm trying to get into modding ksp, I created a blender .dae file and imported it into Unity. Can someone that knows talk over skype or im and go step by step for me it would be much appicated. Thank you!

Ok I'm a noob and I'm trying to get into modding ksp, I created a blender .dae file and imported it into Unity. Can someone that knows talk over skype or im and go step by step for me it would be much appicated. Thank you!

I recommend watching this tutorial.

PM me if you need more help.

I did follow that and I getting this error: <a href="http://s283.photobucket.com/albums/kk293/deltafee/?action=view&current=Weeoe.jpg" target="_blank"><img src="http://i283.photobucket.com/albums/kk293/deltafee/Weeoe.jpg" border="0" alt="Photobucket"></a> I am not sure what it means.
